full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Washers and Dryers
### Language(s) of the tender

 French and English

### Reference Number
WS3649557474 - DO3649557524

### Tender Details

#### Amendment Information
No amendment submitted. Solicitation number: WS3649557474

#### Publication and Closing Dates
Tender publication date: Sep 7, 2022
Tender closing date: Sep 26, 2022 - 02:00 PM EDT

#### Expected Contract Dates
Expected contract start date: Oct 1, 2022
Expected contract end date: Sep 30, 2025

#### Trade Agreements

 The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Procurement Information

Procurement category: *Goods and services*
Procurement method: Competitive open bidding
Selection criteria: Lowest price

#### Tender Description
 Please note that the tender deadline closing time has been modified. Bids must be submitted on Sep 26, 2022 by 02:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Notice URL
 http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13993010?extsite=MTM5OTMwMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
